ad_text: Atlas Sand & Rock Sponsored Atlas Sand & Rock is seeking a Concrete Mixer Truck Driver for its Pullman, WA location. Atlas is a well-established locally owned business. A Mixer Truck Driver is a physical job that requires a “can-do” attitude with a commercial driver’s license. As an essential member of our team, you will be expected to drive the mixer truck to the project, unload the concrete, and serve the customer safely, respectfully, and efficiently. You will be the face of Atlas and will need to present yourself in a well-kept, professional manner. Position Requirements: -Class B Commercial Driver's License with Tanker Endorsement Preferred Qualifications -Class A Commercial Driver's License -Doubles Endorsement Benefits & Compensation -Pay is $24-$28/hr -Paid-Time-Off -Paid Holidays -401K with a 6% Match -Family Medical, Vision & Dental Insurance 100% paid by the company Apply by downloading an application on our website at: https://atlassandr.com/employment/ ATLASSANDR.COM Employment - Atlas Sand & Rock Atlas Sand & Rock specializes in crushed and washed aggregate and concrete productsd in Lewiston, Idaho.
